name: SPINGUN
description: SPINGUN is a "manic two-button arcade shooter". Two buttons. One spaceship. Zero chance to survive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.2+ GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X 9.0c compliant video card with AT LEAST 512Mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 40 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A simple shooter game but has a challenging difficulty. The controls make it difficult to maneuver through the little map which makes the the gameplay interesting.  It's very addicting if you're into hardcore games (not that I'm hardcore. I'm just an averager) with the global ranking encouraging you to keep playing and try harder.  There are many game modes as well, in which all of them look interesting. I would like to try all of them soon.  PS: My right wrist hurts. There is no better control for me for this game rather than the arrow keys.
